item.description:
Easy Kayaking

Saturday July 16th. 10:30 am

Edgewater Canoe & Kayak

35 Edgewater drive Hooksett, NH

Rain will cancel this event.

Host Cindy 107

Co-host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Boat rentals: $5. an hour.

Bring your own boat? Ok but parking is $5. for the day, or free if you are renting a boat.

Give Rob a call to reserve your boat..540-6520 or 485-9251. He will return your call.

Cindy 107 wrote:

Ever want to try kayaking? Well join me and friends and come paddling. I will give you some basic instruction if needed, or just come out on the water and give it a try. You will have a blast. We will paddle up river and take a break for lunch.

So, bring your lunch drinks and we will stop at the park up the river to relax and eat, then enjoy the ride back down river ( paddling will be easier).

They have all sizes to try along with tandems if you'd like to bring your young one. Boats rent for $5/ hr. If you bring your own boat there is a small parking fee of $5.00. There is a porta potty to use too or a truck stop up the road aways.

So please come join us on the river.

Rain will cancel this event.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Easy Kayaking
